createPluginRepoWithFirstVersion(address.details: After the creation of the `PluginRepo` and release of the first version by the factory, ownership is transferred to the `_maintainer` address.

params._maintainer: The maintainer of the plugin repo. This address has permission to update metadata, upgrade the repo logic, and manage the repo permissions.
params._pluginSetup: The plugin factory contract associated with the plugin version.

constructor.notice: Initializes the addresses of the `PluginRepo` base contract to proxy to.

createPluginRepo(address).notice: Creates a plugin repository proxy pointing to the `pluginRepoBase` implementation.

createPluginRepoWithFirstVersion(address.notice: Creates a `PluginRepo` and publishes an initial version `1.0`.

pluginRepoBase().notice: The address of the `PluginRepo` base contract.

userdoc.notice: This contract creates `PluginRepo` proxies and registers them on an `PluginRepoRegistry` contract.
